snippet.title: The Butterbies -  Virtual Pet Game
snippet.description:
Download the app on the Apple Store here : http://bit.ly/1ptTVX3
or on Google Play here : http://bit.ly/1t5bt1W

Follow us on facebook : https://www.facebook.com/Butterbies
and on twitter here : https://twitter.com/Parakiite

Our little lost caterpillar egg needs your help! 

Can you take care of it, clean, feed and play with your own virtual pet and watch it grow into a beautiful butterfly then help it find its way home to the Butterfly Village?

Who knows when it grows up it might be a Princess, Witch, Mermaid or Fairy Butterfly.

FUN FEATURES

* FEED, clean, take care of your virtual pet, watch it grow into a beautiful   Butterfly
* COLLECT the Princess, Fairy, Witch, Ballerina, Mermaid, Pop star, Vampire and Astronaut
* Watch your collection grow and grow.
* STROKE and tickle your virtual pet and see how they respond 
* DECORATE your pet’s home with wallpapers, flowers, blinds and lamps.
* PLAY exciting mini games and earn coins  
* Dress up games and take funny photographs 
* ACHIEVEMENTS to unlock and get rewards as you level up
* TALK to your pet and listen back
* ADOPT new eggs from the nursery
* SHARE with your friends

And much much more with over 20 different Butterbies to collect!

Butterbies is available in English and Spanish

To find out more and for lots of FREE Butterbies goodies please visit us at http://www.butterbies.com/.
